Milano.lock_from_outside: Press the arrow key on the Nuki keypad
Milano.keys_on_table: Building door key + trash bin key
Milano.backup_keys_lockbox_location: Outside apartment door, on the right
Milano.building_exit: White button in front of the elevator at ground floor
Milano.power_panel_location: Switches on the RIGHT side of the apartment entrance door
Milano.cellar_circuit_breaker: Backup keys needed (lockbox code 2709) to access cellar via ground floor door behind lift
Milano.key_return: Leave the keys on the table
Milano.form_explanation_en: In Italy, short-term rentals are required to register all guests just like hotels. This is why we need this information. It will be submitted to the Tourism office and then removed from our records.
Milano.form_explanation_it: Tutte le case e appartamenti vacanza hanno l'obbligo di registrare tutti i propri ospiti, come gli hotel. Dopo aver inviato i dati alla questura, i vostri dati verranno eliminati.
Milano.parking_name: Parcheggio Corso Bolzano - Stazione Porta Susa
Milano.sofa_bed_note: Mattress is thinner than a proper bed
Milano.netflix_note: Guests must use their own Netflix account. Amazon Prime is included.
Milano.luggage_storage_nearby: Kipoint at Milano Centrale, Stow Your Bags (400m from apartment)
Milano.ac_instructions: In check-in video at 50-second mark. MODE button on display, select snowflake for cold, sun for heat.

troubleshooting_instructions.electricity: Step 1: Check switches on RIGHT side of apartment door, ensure all turned UP. Step 2: If not fixed, go to cellar — get backup keys from lockbox outside apartment door (code 2709). Use key to open door behind lift (ground floor) and cellar door. Reset the circuit breaker. Video: https://youtu.be/Th1pxWFlLuU. Offer to come by if guest can't fix it.
troubleshooting_instructions.building_exit: White button in front of the elevator at ground floor. Shown at end of check-in video: https://youtu.be/VWsDkN7Zwus
troubleshooting_instructions.sofa_bed: Video to open: https://youtu.be/BLICzW5BnLU. Video to close: https://youtu.be/BR-SsjCgqCY. 30 EUR surcharge for setup with sheets.
troubleshooting_instructions.hot_water: Video: https://youtu.be/gMiZkQbm04c. Hot water controlled by building system.
troubleshooting_instructions.ac_cold: MODE button on display, select snowflake icon. Also shown in check-in video at 50-second mark.
troubleshooting_instructions.ac_heat: AC doubles as heat pump. MODE button, select sun icon.

Drovetti.lockbox_instruction_en: Once you inserted the code twist the knob to open it
Drovetti.lockbox_instruction_it: Una volta inserito bisogna girare la manopola per aprirlo
Drovetti.keys_include: Condominium door key, apartment key, garbage key
Drovetti.key_return: Leave the keys in the lockbox
Drovetti.form_explanation_en: In Italy, short-term rentals are required to register all guests just like hotels. This is why we need this information. It will be submitted to the Tourism office and then removed from our records.
Drovetti.form_explanation_it: Tutte le case e appartamenti vacanza hanno l'obbligo di registrare tutti i propri ospiti, come gli hotel. Dopo aver inviato i dati alla questura, i vostri dati verranno eliminati.
Drovetti.remote_buzzer_note_en: Please send us a message 20 minutes before your arrival on this chat so that we can prepare to buzz you in remotely.
Drovetti.remote_buzzer_note_it: Avvisateci 20 minuti prima del vostro arrivo tramite la chat in modo da essere pronti ad aprirvi il portone condominiale da remoto.
Drovetti.sofa_bed_note: 3 beds in same room. Surcharge typically only for 3+ guests.
Drovetti.boiler_switch_location: Next to the bathroom mirror, left side
Drovetti.heating_type: Central heating (condominium-controlled). OFF from 11pm to 5am in Turin region.
Drovetti.heating_tip: Move radiator valves to position 4 or 5 for faster warmth in the morning. AC can be used as heat pump with sun icon.
Drovetti.luggage_storage_nearby: Radical Storage near Porta Susa (~5 EUR/bag)
Drovetti.nearby: Porta Susa station (5 min walk), Piazza Benefica market

troubleshooting_instructions.ac_climate: Link digital guide first: https://v2.hostfully.com/gwznxzs then video: https://youtu.be/bo4tJ04uHy8
troubleshooting_instructions.heating_cold: Central heating is condominium-controlled, off 11pm-5am. Move radiator valves to 4 or 5. AC can be used as heat pump — set to sun icon.
troubleshooting_instructions.hot_water: Boiler button is next to the bathroom mirror (left side). If accidentally switched off, turn ON and wait for water to heat up.
troubleshooting_instructions.building_entry: Host buzzes in remotely. Guest must message 20 min before arrival.

Bardonecchia.address: Condominio Colomion, Via Melezet 127, Les Arnauds, Bardonecchia
Bardonecchia.key_return: Close the door and leave the key inside the lockbox
Bardonecchia.form_explanation_en: In Italy, short-term rentals are required to register all guests just like hotels. This is why we need this information. It will be submitted to the Tourism office and then removed from our records.
Bardonecchia.form_explanation_it: Tutte le case e appartamenti vacanza hanno l'obbligo di registrare tutti i propri ospiti, come gli hotel. Dopo aver inviato i dati alla questura, i vostri dati verranno eliminati.
Bardonecchia.boiler_note: Leave ON for entire stay. Takes 1-2 hours to heat from cold. 4 consecutive adult showers NOT possible.
Bardonecchia.loft_warning: Upstairs/loft (soppalco) has slanted ceilings — NOT recommended for adults, better for children.
checkout_special: Leave the fridge empty and open
Throw away the garbage (bins on the road to Via Melezet)
Turn OFF the general electricity switch
Bardonecchia.parking: Free public parking on the road to Via Melezet
Bardonecchia.tourist_tax_note: NOT included in Booking.com price — collected separately (cash on table, Satispay, PayPal, or bank transfer)
Bardonecchia.nearby: Campo Smith (10-15 min walk downhill), Borgo Vecchio via passeggiata del canale (20 min)
Bardonecchia.ski_schools: Scuola Sci Bardonecchia, Scuola Nord Ovest, 04 (snowboard, Borgo Vecchio)
Bardonecchia.tv_note: Small remote for volume only. Big remote: press SOURCE, select HDMI 1 or HDMI 2, then Prime Video from menu. Netflix requires guest's own account.

troubleshooting_instructions.hot_water: Electric boiler (80L), switch on RIGHT side of bathroom door. Must be ON. Takes 1-2 hours to heat from cold. Leave ON for entire stay. Warning: 4 consecutive adult showers not possible.
troubleshooting_instructions.tv_remote: Small remote = volume only. Big remote: press SOURCE → HDMI 1 or HDMI 2 → Prime Video. Netflix requires guest's own account.

Giacinto Collegno.lockbox_instruction_en: Once you inserted the code pull the lever to open it
Giacinto Collegno.lockbox_instruction_it: Una volta inserito bisogna tirare la levetta per aprirlo
Giacinto Collegno.keys_include: Condominium door key, apartment key, garbage key
Giacinto Collegno.key_return: Leave the keys on the table
Giacinto Collegno.form_explanation_en: In Italy, short-term rentals are required to register all guests just like hotels. This is why we need this information. It will be submitted to the Tourism office and then removed from our records.
Giacinto Collegno.form_explanation_it: Tutte le case e appartamenti vacanza hanno l'obbligo di registrare tutti i propri ospiti, come gli hotel. Dopo aver inviato i dati alla questura, i vostri dati verranno eliminati.
Giacinto Collegno.remote_buzzer_note_en: Please send us a message 20 minutes before your arrival on this chat so that we can prepare to buzz you in remotely.
Giacinto Collegno.remote_buzzer_note_it: Avvisateci 20 minuti prima del vostro arrivo tramite la chat in modo da essere pronti ad aprirvi il portone condominiale da remoto.
Giacinto Collegno.power_switches_location: Wall buttons next to the fridge, behind the Nespresso coffee machine
Giacinto Collegno.induction_cooktop_note: Has induction cooktop — regular coffee maker won't work, use Nespresso with pods
Giacinto Collegno.heating_type: Central heating (condominium-controlled). OFF from 11pm to 5am in Turin region.
Giacinto Collegno.heating_tip: Move radiator valves to position 4 or 5. AC can be used as heat pump with sun icon.
Giacinto Collegno.terrace: Large outdoor terrace with table, chairs, and lounger
Giacinto Collegno.luggage_storage_nearby: Radical Storage near Porta Susa (~5 EUR/bag)
Giacinto Collegno.nearby: CIT Turin neighborhood, Piazza Benefica market (daily except Sunday)

troubleshooting_instructions.electricity: Check the wall buttons next to the fridge, behind the Nespresso coffee machine. Make sure they are all ON.
troubleshooting_instructions.heating_cold: Central heating is condominium-controlled, off 11pm-5am. Move radiator valves to 4 or 5. AC can be used as heat pump — set to sun icon.
troubleshooting_instructions.induction: Induction cooktop — regular (moka) coffee maker won't work. Use the Nespresso machine with pods.

_common.wifi_backup: Airalo eSIM — referral code LORENZ5261, US$3 off first pack: https://ref.airalo.com/1z4y
_common.tourist_tax_payment_methods: Cash (leave on table), Satispay (Donatella 3391369993), PayPal, bank transfer, SumUp credit card link

luggage_storage_general.turin: Radical Storage near Porta Susa (~5 EUR/bag)
luggage_storage_general.milano: Kipoint at Milano Centrale, Stow Your Bags (400m)
